title: League crashes once a game in game. help please
body: Hey, recently as of 2 days ago my league crashes once everygame around 20min mark randomly, it'll say  "Client stopped responding, (close game)" and i reconnect and it's fine after that. But it happens every single game atleast once and i even reformatted computer and it's still doing this. Any ideas of what this can be? it's never happened before

replies.body: It seems that sometimes is failing to render in your match causing it to crash, and it could be due to bad game files or even driver issues.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
